data.convo: Look , Bob . This is a photograph I took during my trip to Australia . Let me see it , can I ? This is a good photograph . Who are these people ? They ’ re people I met during the trip . That ’ s the ship we traveled on . What a beautiful ship ! Who ’ s this ? That ’ s the man I told you about . Remember ? Ah yes . The one who offered you a job in Australia . That ’ s right . Who ’ s this ? Guess ! It ’ s not you , is it ? That ’ s right . I grew a beard during the trip , but I shaved it off when I came home . Why did you shave it off ? My wife didn ’ t like it !
